title: Happy Birthday, Kanan-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Ahh~, that was fun! Thank you so much for today, Ruby-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ehehe, Ruby is glad you’re happy! It was worth all the effort everyone put together.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>But that was hilarious~! I went today expecting a birthday cake, but it was a birthday pizza instead! I’ve never seen one before!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>We had trouble with the pizza. Drawing the shape of the letters with vegetables and ketchup was really hard.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I’m truly thankful for everything. So, where are we going now? Everyone’s gone home, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Do you want to visit the observatory for a bit? It would be great to go watch the starry sky on your birthday, Kanan-chan. Then Ruby wants to wish you a happy birthday again there.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>That sounds good, let’s go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ehehe, it’s gonna be fun~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>....Ah, I see, so that’s it. When we get there, everyone will-....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Aaaah~! No, stop! You can’t say it even if you know! We were going to surprise you one more-.... Pigii!?!? Ruby said it....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Fufu, guess I got it right~♪ Ah, I’ve got an idea. Why don’t we be the ones to surprise them instead? Lend me your ears, Ruby-chan. You see.... *Whisper Whisper*.....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>W-, wow!! That sounds interesting~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
